Lyrics: a butcher yes that was my trade
Phonetic Transcription: ey b_uh_ch_er y_eh_s dh_ae_t w_ah_z m_ay t_r_ey_d

Lyrics: but the king-s shilling (is) now my fee
Phonetic Transcription: b_ah_t dh_iy k_ih_ng_z sh_ih_l_ih_ng ah_z n_aw m_ay f_iy

Lyrics: a butcher I may (as) well have stayed
Phonetic Transcription: ey b_uh_ch_er ay m_ey ae_z w_eh_l hh_ae_v s_t_ey_d

Lyrics: for the slaughter that I see
Phonetic Transcription: f_ao_r dh_ah s_l_ao_t_er dh_ae_t ay s_iy

Lyrics: and the preacher in his pulpit
Phonetic Transcription: ah_n_d dh_ah p_r_iy_ch_er ih_n hh_ih_z p_uh_l_p_ih_t

Lyrics: sermon Go and fight do what (is) right
Phonetic Transcription: s_er_m_ah_n g_ow ah_n_d f_ay_t d_uw w_ah_t ih_z r_ay_t

Lyrics: but he don-t have to hear these guns
Phonetic Transcription: b_ah_t hh_iy d_ow_n_t hh_ae_v t_uw hh_ih_r dh_iy_z g_ah_n_z

Lyrics: and Ill bet he sleeps at night
Phonetic Transcription: ah_n_d ay_l b_eh_t hh_iy s_l_iy_p_s ae_t n_ay_t

Lyrics: and I have seen a friend of mine
Phonetic Transcription: ah_n_d ay hh_ae_v s_iy_n ah f_r_eh_n_d ah_v m_ay_n

Lyrics: then in the heat the flies come down
Phonetic Transcription: dh_eh_n ih_n dh_ah hh_iy_t dh_ah f_l_ay_z k_ah_m d_aw_n

Lyrics: and the flies come down in
Phonetic Transcription: ah_n_d dh_ah f_l_ay_z k_ah_m d_aw_n ih_n

Lyrics: if the preacher he could see those flies
Phonetic Transcription: ah_f dh_ah p_r_iy_ch_er hh_iy k_uh_d s_iy dh_ow_z f_l_ay_z

Lyrics: wouldn-t preach for the sound of guns
Phonetic Transcription: w_uh_d_ah_n_t p_r_iy_ch f_ao_r dh_ah s_aw_n_d ah_v g_ah_n_z
